# requestedTime

**Instance Property**

A time in the video timeline at which you request an image.

## Declaration

```swift
var requestedTime: CMTime { get }
```

## Accessing image data

- **image**: An image for a requested time.
- **actualTime**: The actual time in the video timeline at which the image generator creates the image.
